records.end_date_ts: UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CASE WHEN MIN(r2.fact_date) IS NOT NULL AND (r1.memory_mb != -1 AND r1.vcpus != -1) THEN MIN(r2.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY WHEN r1.memory_mb = -1 AND r1.vcpus = -1 AND (SELECT MAX(fact_date) FROM modw_cloud.raw_resource_specs) != MAX(r2.fact_date) THEN MAX(r1.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY ELSE CURDATE() END)
records.start_day_id: IF(r1.memory_mb = -1 AND r1.vcpus = -1, YEAR(r2.fact_date) * 100000 + DAYOFYEAR(r2.fact_date), YEAR(r1.fact_date) * 100000 + DAYOFYEAR(r1.fact_date))
records.end_day_id: CASE WHEN MIN(r2.fact_date) IS NOT NULL AND (r1.memory_mb != -1 AND r1.vcpus != -1) THEN YEAR(MIN(r2.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 100000 + DAYOFYEAR(MIN(r2.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHEN r1.memory_mb = -1 AND r1.vcpus = -1 AND (SELECT MAX(fact_date) FROM modw_cloud.raw_resource_specs) != MAX(r2.fact_date) THEN YEAR(MAX(r1.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 100000 + DAYOFYEAR(MAX(r1.fact_date) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) ELSE YEAR(CURDATE()) * 100000 + DAYOFYEAR(CURDATE()) END

joins.name: raw_resource_specs
joins.on: r1.resource_id = r2.resource_id AND r1.hostname = r2.hostname AND r1.fact_date < r2.fact_date AND (r1.memory_mb != r2.memory_mb OR r1.vcpus != r2.vcpus)
